description.translate: The disillusioned veteran will never again let go of the wind. Weighed down by wounds that nothing can erase.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Bourrasque mélancolique\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7L'aguerri désabusé ne se relâchera jamais plus au gré du vent.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7 Alourdi par des blessures que rien ne saurait effacer.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The disillusioned veteran will never again let go of the wind.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Weighed down by wounds that nothing can erase.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HUN§a1 §7HAS§c-1\"}"]}}
